game.name: Baby Audrey Appendectomy
game.description:
Oh no! The deadly stomach ache has hit your favorite and cute little Baby Audrey. You as a doctor diagnosed her stomach and found that she is infected with the appendix. The problem is that she can only be relieved of this kind of problem when you provide her with the immediate appendectomy surgical procedure. Do you think that your doctoring abilities can guide her during her tough time? Join Baby Audrey Appendectomy and be prepared to provide the best treatment for the problem of appendix!

Start with checking her health first and decide whether is ready to go under the surgical procedure in this HTML5 doctor game! Check her BP, body temperature, and give her the needful injection to lessen her pain! Perform the ultrasound to know the extra status of her appendix! Then move on towards performing the surgical procedure. Give her stomach a small cut and then open it up with the help of a medical tool! Zoom out the picture and then spray the medicine to remove all the harmful bacteria!

Then replace the infected part with the healthy one. Now clear her intestine from all the deadly germs and bacteria. Make sure to give her the needful vitamins and medicines to help the lady to recover from this biggest surgical procedure. Try out more hospital simulators on our website and get the pleasure of experiencing the optimum possible fun without a download! We are happy to upgrade our website with new girls games so there is no chance of getting bored when you stay connected with us.
